src.__main__ module

Main CLI file for Task List Application.

src.__main__.commands()[source]

Register subcommands with the main CLI.

This function registers all the available subcommands with

the main CLI group.

src.utils module

Utility functions.

src.utils.read_json(filename: str) → dict[source]

Read data from a JSON file.

Parameters:

filename (str) – The name of the JSON file to read.

Returns:

The data read from the JSON file, represented as a dictionary.

Return type:

dict

src.utils.write_json(filename: str, data: dict)[source]

Write data to a JSON file.

Parameters:

  • filename (str) – The name of the JSON file to write to.

  • data (dict) – The data to be written to the JSON file, represented as a dictionary.
